Esther Uzodinma bụ onye Naijirịa na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-emepụta ihe nke a maara nke ọma maka ọrụ ya dị ka "Angela" na Africa Magic TV series My Siblings and I

Ọ na-amụ Mass Communication na Mahadum Lagos
N'afọ 2018, Esther malitere ọrụ ime ihe nkiri ya na usoro ihe nkiri TV Africa Magic, My Siblings and I, nke e wepụtara na Jenụwari 2018.
Esther gosipụtara dị ka onye "Sade" na usoro telivishọn Sade (The Missing Girl). Ọ na-eme mkpesa banyere enweghị nlebara anya n'aka ụmụ nwoke.
